            <div class='newscontent left'><img src='/Templates/Units/Image.ashx?src=/PageFiles/27207/SD_linear_2_web.jpg&amp;width=294&amp;height=150' alt='' /><h2><a href='/About-the-company/News-new/Recall-campaign---BMW-Steering-damper/'>Recall campaign - aftermarket steering damper</a></h2><p class='date-type'>8/19/2013 </p><p>&#214;hlins Racing is currently having a recall campaign of &#214;hlins aftermarket steering dampers for the BMW S1000 RR and BMW R1200 R motorcycles sold between 2010 and 2012. 

</p></div>
		    

	    
	        
            <div class='newscontent right'><img src='/Templates/Units/Image.ashx?src=/PageFiles/27204/24hrs_13_rg_mp_top40q_450_001.jpg&amp;width=294&amp;height=150' alt='' /><h2><a href='/About-the-company/News-new/Second-overall-and-class-dominance-in-Nurburgring-24-hour/'>Second overall and class dominance in Nürburgring 24 hour</a></h2><p class='date-type'>5/24/2013 </p><p>&#214;hlins equipped teams stood out in the N&#252;rburgring 24-hour race with some stunning performance in a heavy rain endurance race. </p></div>
		    </div></div>

	    
	        <div class='news bb'><div class='newscontentwrap'>
            <div class='newscontent left'><img src='/Templates/Units/Image.ashx?src=/PageFiles/27200/dashboard_multistrada_SCU_2.jpg&amp;width=294&amp;height=150' alt='' /><h2><a href='/About-the-company/News-new/Ohlins-launch-semi-active-upgrade-for-Multistrada-S/'>Öhlins launch semi-active upgrade for Multistrada S</a></h2><p class='date-type'>4/30/2013 </p><p>&#214;hlins have announced a brand new Suspension Control Unit, or SCU, upgrade for the Ducati Multistrada S to give the machine semi-active suspension. </p></div>
		    

	    
	        
            <div class='newscontent right'><img src='/Templates/Units/Image.ashx?src=/PageFiles/27198/SD21_2_w.jpg&amp;width=294&amp;height=150' alt='' /><h2><a href='/About-the-company/News-new/Newly-interchangeable-off-road-steering-damper-by-Ohlins/'>Newly interchangeable off road steering damper by Öhlins</a></h2><p class='date-type'>2/12/2013 </p><p>&#214;hlins introduces the 2.1 SD version of its popular off-road steering damper with a revised design including a new mounting system- so it can be transferred from one machine to another.</p></div>
		    </div></div>

	    
	        <div class='news'><div class='newscontentwrap'>
            <div class='newscontent left'><img src='/Templates/Units/Image.ashx?src=/PageFiles/27193/WSB-spec-Ohlins-test-machine.jpg&amp;width=294&amp;height=150' alt='' /><h2><a href='/About-the-company/News-new/Ohlins-showcases-new-products-at-EICMA/'>Öhlins showcases new products at EICMA</a></h2><p class='date-type'>12/3/2012 </p><p>&#214;hlins Racing reflect on a busy EICMA Show with the launches of a new electronic suspension system for the Ducati Multistrada, fork kits for the BMW F800 GS and Triumph Tiger, MX competition equipment and a full Smart EC system showcased on the latest MV Agusta F4 RR. </p></div>
		    

	    
	        
            <div class='newscontent right'><img src='/Templates/Units/Image.ashx?src=/PageFiles/27191/Formula-Nippon.jpg&amp;width=294&amp;height=150' alt='' /><h2><a href='/About-the-company/News-new/Japanese-success/'>Japanese success</a></h2><p class='date-type'>11/22/2012 </p><p>There were an intense title battle in Japan’s premier single seater category, Formula Nippon. </p></div>
